column1: '''''Amon Hen'' 116''' is the one-hundred-and-fifteenth issue of the [[The Tolkien Society]]'s bimonthly journal ''[[Amon Hen (journal)

The section "Important item for auction at Sotherby's [sic] in July" (in Reports) includes several quotations from and a description of [[J.R.R. Tolkien]]'s notes in proof copies of ''[[The Lord of the Rings]]''.
** By: Kirsty Beck, Ian Collier, Susanne Stopfel, Martin Roe, Kenneth Meetham, Kay Woollard & Neil Loughran
